name: BattleFruit - Demo
description:
BattleFruit is a top-down shooter, in which you play as either fruit or vegetables that are locked in a brutal war with one another. In this playable demo, you can play the first level as the tomato character. Each character has a primary weapon, secondary weapon, melee attack, dodge roll and special ability. The game is part of my college course, and is essentially still a work in progress.

NOTE: You may need to zoom out within the browser in order to see the whole game.

If you die, simply left-click on the 'expired' screen and you'll re-spawn at the last save-point.

Here are the basic controls:

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Melee

W,A,S,D - Move

SPACE - Dodge Roll

R - Reload

Q - Swap Weapos

E - Activate Special Ability

P - Toggle Pause

SHIFT - Advance Dialogue
